aboutMe.heading: About Me
aboutMe.description: I am a British full-stack developer, teacher and mentor. I love creating innovative web solutions, helping people learn to code and sharing my knowledge with others. Based in Kristiansand, Norway, I blend technical expertise with a creative approach to problem-solving. I have extensive experience in both front-end and back-end development, specializing in building responsive, user-friendly web applications using modern frameworks and tools. My technical background allows me to tackle complex challenges across the entire development stack. I'm currently open to new opportunities within Norway, the EU, and the UK. I am passionate about teaching and mentoring, and I enjoy sharing my knowledge with others. I have experience in leading workshops, giving talks, and mentoring junior developers.

expertise.heading: My Expertise
expertise.description: Are you in need of a pragmatic enthusiast to drive your project forward? Fluent in the languages of engineering and aesthetics, I'm uniquely equipped to chart a couse for a practical product that prioritizes the customer's experience. My forte is full-stack development and devops engineering, and I'm committed to choosing the most fitting tools for each project, whether it's a robust framework or the latest web innovations. I understand that the key lies not only in impressive interfaces and blazing performance but also in striking a harmonious balance between sustainable implementation and user-centric functionality. Let's collaborate to bring your project to life.

tech.heading: Tech
tech.description: These are just some of the technologies I am familiar with.

projects.heading: My Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on. Each represents a unique challenge and learning experience.

projectOne.title: Portfolio Website
projectOne.description: A responsive portfolio website built with Next.js, featuring GSAP animations and multi-language support.

projectTwo.title: E-commerce Platform
projectTwo.description: A full-featured online store with user authentication, product management, and payment processing.

projectThree.title: Mobile App
projectThree.description: A cross-platform mobile application built with React Native for both iOS and Android devices.

company1.name: Tech Innovations Ltd
company1.shortDescription: Leading the frontend team in developing and maintaining web applications
company1.description: As a Senior Frontend Developer at Tech Innovations, I lead a team of developers in building and maintaining responsive, high-performance web applications that serve thousands of users daily.

responsibilities.title: Key Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: I lead the frontend architecture decisions, mentor junior developers, collaborate with design teams, and ensure code quality through code reviews and automated testing.

achievements.title: Major Achievements
achievements.content: Reduced page load times by 40% through optimization techniques, implemented a component library that improved developer productivity by 25%, and led the migration from a legacy system to a modern React-based architecture.

modernization.title: Tech Stack Modernization
modernization.content: Introduced TypeScript, React Testing Library, and Storybook to improve code quality and developer experience. Implemented CI/CD pipelines that reduced deployment time from hours to minutes.

company2.name: Digital Solutions Inc.
company2.shortDescription: Developed full-stack applications for enterprise clients
company2.description: At Digital Solutions Inc., I worked on a variety of projects for enterprise clients, developing full-stack applications with a focus on user experience and performance.

highlights.title: Project Highlights
highlights.content: Developed a customer portal for a major healthcare provider that streamlined patient appointment scheduling. Created an internal dashboard for a financial institution that provided real-time analytics.

collaboration.title: Cross-Functional Collaboration
collaboration.content: Worked closely with UX designers, product managers, and backend engineers to deliver cohesive solutions that met client needs while adhering to technical constraints.

integration.title: Backend Integration
integration.content: Integrated multiple third-party APIs and services, implementing robust error handling and data validation to ensure system reliability.

company3.name: Startup Ventures
company3.shortDescription: Developed responsive web applications for various startup projects
company3.description: I joined Startup Ventures as an early employee and played a key role in developing the frontend architecture for multiple startup projects.

environment.title: Startup Environment
environment.content: Worked in a fast-paced environment where I gained experience across the entire development lifecycle, from initial concept to deployment and maintenance.

design.title: Responsive Design
design.content: Created responsive designs that worked seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices, improving user engagement and satisfaction.

optimization.title: Performance Optimization
optimization.content: Implemented performance optimizations that improved page load times and overall application responsiveness, resulting in higher user retention.

contact.availability: I am currently available for freelance work and new opportunities.
